item.title: 英国财政大臣职位存疑，英债和英镑下跌
item.description: 由于对英国财政政策的担忧，英国债券和英镑遭到抛售。【原文：UK bonds and the pound sold off on concern around the nation’s fiscal policies.】

item.title: 干燥天气加速收获，咖啡价格跌至 11 月低点
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡价格跌至七个月来的最低点，原因是干旱天气的恢复有助于加快巴西的收获速度，同时人们担心需求疲软。【原文：Arabica coffee prices fell to their lowest in seven months as the return of dry weather helps accelerate harvesting in Brazil amid concerns over a weakness in demand.】

item.title: 软银获得超过 170 亿美元的美元和欧元债券需求
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的美元和欧元债券吸引了超过 173 亿美元的投资者竞购，这家科技投资公司正转向全球债务市场，以加快其在全球范围内推进人工智能的步伐。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has pulled in more than $17.3 billion-equivalent of investor bids for its dollar and euro bonds as the technology investment firm turns to global debt markets to accelerates its global push into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国 6 月私人就业人数意外减少
item.description: 6 月份美国公司的就业人数出现了两年多来的首次下降，反映出服务业薪资的下降可能会引发对劳动力市场更明显放缓的担忧。【原文：Employment at US companies fell in June for the first time in more than two years, reflecting a drop in services payrolls that may raise concerns about a more pronounced labor market slowdown.】

item.title: 美国要求越南根据外资含量缴纳更高的关税
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，越南和美国据说即将达成一项贸易框架，将根据外国产品所占的比例对商品征收一定范围的关税。【原文：Vietnam and the US are said to be close to a trade framework that will see goods given a scaled range of tariffs depending on the percentage of foreign content, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: Cotality 称新西兰房价回升势头依然温和
item.description: 新西兰房价三个月来首次出现上涨，为利率下降带来的温和复苏迹象锦上添花。【原文：New Zealand house prices rose for the first time in three months, adding to signs of a modest recovery as interest rates fall.】

item.title: 荣誉有望凭借超薄可折叠手机超越三星
item.description: 中国硬件品牌荣耀（Honor）发布了一款更轻薄的可折叠手机，希望在三星电子（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Chinese hardware brand Honor announced a slimmer foldable phone, a bid to out-design Samsung Electronics Co. days before it launches its own new foldable devices.】

item.title: Milei 的外汇交易调整让经纪商进军银行业
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）在取消资本管制时，剥夺了为其业务带来丰厚利润的套利机会，此后，阿根廷的经纪公司正在进行重组。【原文：Argentina’s brokerages are restructuring after President Javier Milei took away lucrative arbitrage opportunities that juiced their business when he rolled back capital controls.】

item.title: 欧佩克供应激增是谨慎之举还是抢夺市场份额？
item.description:
6月份，中东主要产油国的原油发货量创下两年来的新高。【原文：

Crude shipments from key Middle East producers reached a two-year high in June.

】

item.title: 非洲开发银行因贸易担忧将南非经济增长前景下调一半
item.description: 非洲开发银行在下调南非经济预期时表示，南非必须加快结构性改革，以抵消包括美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战在内的全球挑战。【原文：South Africa must accelerate structural reforms to offset global challenges that include US President Donald Trump’s trade war, the African Development Bank said as it cut the nation’s economic forecast.】

item.title: 特朗普奚落美联储主席鲍威尔后，美联储在欧洲遭 "爱情炸弹 "轰炸
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注欧洲对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的支持。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at European support for Fed Chair Jerome Powell. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 微软裁员表明人工智能成本上升带来压力
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，布罗迪-福特（Brody Ford）将报道人工智能支出的增长。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Brody Ford reports on the rising artificial intelligence spending.】

item.title: 摩根大通研究所解析关税成本如何转嫁
item.description: 在过去一年里，进口商，尤其是中型企业争相抢购，因为这些企业往往利润微薄，是供应链中的重要环节。【原文：Importers have scrambled a lot over the past year, especially midsize businesses, which often operate on thin margins and are a vital link in supply chains.】

item.title: 私募股权投资正努力克服估值疑虑
item.description:
公开股票市场的飙升也推高了可比私人资产的酝酿价格，使其更难出售。【原文：

The spike in public stock markets is pushing up the mooted price of comparable private assets too, making them harder to sell.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率创四月以来最低，促进再融资
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周降至 4 月初以来的最低水平，这有助于推动住房再融资申请的增加。【原文：US mortgage rates dropped last week to the lowest level since early April, helping spark a pickup in home-refinance applications.】

item.title: 阿斯利康考虑退出，伦敦新上市企业创 28 年新低
item.description: 自 1997 年以来，伦敦上半年的首次公开募股（IPO）数量增长最为缓慢，而阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）首席执行官希望将该公司迁往美国上市的报道更是为这一黯淡的里程碑添上了浓墨重彩的一笔。【原文：London marked the slowest first half-year for IPO volume since 1997, a grim milestone punctuated by a report that AstraZeneca Plc’s chief executive officer wants to move the company’s listing to the US.】

item.title: 英国央行泰勒呼吁 2025 年再降息三次
item.description: 随着英国经济硬着陆风险的增加，英格兰银行利率制定者艾伦-泰勒呼吁加快宽松步伐，今年再降息三次。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Alan Taylor called for a faster pace of easing with three more interest-rate cuts this year, as the risk of a hard landing for the UK economy mounts.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩担心通胀长期低迷的影响
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩担心，通胀率长期低于 2% 可能会改变欧元区消费者的物价前景。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn is worried that inflation staying below 2% for a lengthy period could shift the price outlook of euro-zone consumers.】

item.title: 意大利银行集团 Sella 据称将测试稳定币托管服务
item.description: 意大利银行集团 Banca Sella Holding SpA 正在进行内部试点，测试稳定币等数字资产的托管情况。【原文：Banca Sella Holding SpA, an Italian banking group, is running an internal pilot to test custody of digital assets like stablecoins, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 据说 AirPod 制造商 Luxshare 将为香港上市挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卢克夏尔精密工业公司正与中国国际金融有限公司、中信证券股份有限公司和高盛集团就其香港上市计划进行合作。【原文：Luxshare Precision Industry Co. is working with China International Capital Corp., Citic Securities Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on its planned Hong Kong listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 万亿美元资金池掩盖中东风险投资悖论
item.description: 尽管第一季度初创企业融资强劲，但中东的风险投资生态系统却面临着一个独特的悖论：该地区的主权财富基金和家族办公室拥有数万亿美元的资金，但初创企业却难以获得扩大规模所需的资金。【原文：Despite a strong first quarter for startup funding, the Middle East’s venture ecosystem faces a unique paradox: The region’s sovereign wealth funds and family offices wield trillions of dollars and yet startups are struggling to access the funding they need to scale.】

item.title: 德国批准在海洋保护区钻探天然气
item.description: 德国为在北海一处受保护的海域钻探多达 130 亿立方米的天然气开了绿灯，这是德国为加强能源安全而采取的一项有争议的举措。【原文：Germany has given the green light for drilling as much as 13 billion cubic meters of natural gas at a protected marine site in the North Sea in a controversial step to bolster energy security.】

item.title: 北京严阵以待美国贸易协议试图将中国拒之门外
item.description: 华盛顿和北京之间的贸易休战可能暂时得以维持，但中国对其他地方发生的事情越来越警惕：美国努力达成的协议可能会将中国企业孤立于全球供应链之外。【原文：The trade truce between Washington and Beijing may be holding for now, but China is increasingly wary about what’s happening elsewhere: US efforts to forge deals that could isolate Chinese firms from global supply chains.】

item.title: 最近市场上到处都出现了欣喜若狂的迹象
item.description:
美国股市、欧洲垃圾债券和前沿市场都在飞速发展

。【原文：

US stocks, European junk bonds and frontier markets are all flying

】

item.title: 意大利财政部长表示意大利将继续保持财政谨慎
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利将继续坚持审慎的财政政策，这使该国得以降低借贷成本。【原文：Italy will continue to stick with the fiscal prudence that has allowed the country to reduce its borrowing costs, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚寻求紧缩计划以缩小欧盟最大的预算缺口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，罗马尼亚将提出一项提高税收和冻结公共部门工资的财政方案，以将明年的预算赤字削减至经济产出的 6% 以下，避免评级被下调至垃圾级。【原文：Romania is set to present a fiscal package of tax hikes and wage freezes in the public sector to cut the budget deficit to below 6% of economic output next year and avoid a rating downgrade to junk, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 南非财政部警告不要改变南非央行所有权
item.description: 据国家财政部称，改变南非储备银行的所有权结构可能会引发投资者对征用的担忧，并给产权带来更多不确定性。【原文：Changing the ownership structure of the South African Reserve Bank could generate fears among investors about expropriation and create more uncertainty about property rights, according to the National Treasury.】

item.title: 特斯拉 6 月在华出货量 2025 年来首次增长
item.description: 特斯拉公司上海工厂今年的汽车交付量首次出现增长，其先进的驾驶辅助功能扫清了监管障碍，这对这家美国汽车制造商来说可能是个好消息。【原文：Tesla Inc. saw its first increase in vehicle deliveries from its Shanghai factory this year, with the US automaker potentially buoyed by the clearance of regulatory hurdles for its advanced driver-assistance features.】

item.title: 苹果、Alphabet 和特斯拉阻碍 S&P 500 指数反弹
item.description: 投资者可能会想，如果不是其中三只最有影响力的股票落后，S&P 500 指数会高出多少呢？【原文：Investors may be tempted to imagine how much higher the S&P 500 Index would be if three of its most influential stocks weren’t lagging behind.】

item.title: 加纳通胀率创三年新低，降息成为可能
item.description: 加纳的年通胀率降至三年多来的最低点，因为更坚挺的第纳尔帮助抑制了进口成本，从而提高了政策制定者在本月晚些时候削减借贷成本的可能性。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate dropped to a more than three-year low as a stronger cedi helped curb import costs, raising the prospect that policymakers may cut borrowing costs later this month.】
